frontmatter.title: Smart Tourism - Smart Destinations: Cultural Heritage, Digitalisation and Sustainability aspects

node.excerpt: About this webinar: The Webinar will present and discuss the latest concepts and initiatives on Smart Tourism and Smart Destinations, in relation to cultural heritage, digitalisation and sustainability. In particular, the ‘Smart Tourism’ framework of…

frontmatter.title: Museums Up - ReInherit’s Podcast fifth  episode: “Cultural tourism”

node.excerpt: Do you know what sustainable cultural tourism means? How can museums and heritage sites develop and promote cultural tourism though cooperation? Manos Vougioukas, Secretary-General of the European Cultural Tourism Network (ECTN) and member of Europe…
